original_text: David's men have been very kind to us. When we were with them in the fields, they did not hurt us. They did not take anything from us the whole time that we were there.
korean_text: 우리가 들에 있어 그들과 상종할 동안에 그 사람들이 우리를 매우 선대하였으므로 우리가 다치거나 잃은 것이 없었으니

sentences.original_text: David's men have been very kind to us.
When we were with them in the fields,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그들과 함께 들에 있을 때,

sentences.original_text: They did not take anything from us
the whole time that we were there.
